QuestData.Title: The Pink Turnip Challenge
QuestData.Description: Old Hillpaw bet me that my land couldn't grow a pink turnip.$b$bI'll show him. My land will grow the biggest, pinkest turnip that old coot's ever seen!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Pink Turnip in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
